title: ‘It needs to be reviewed…,’ says Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong, as he wants AI to write 50% of his platform’s code
description: Coinbase, a cryptocurrency platform, has announced that over 40% of Coinbase’s code is written by artificial intelligence, according to CEO Brian Armstrong.
content: AI is eating jobs one by one! You might have read it everywhere but it’s the Truth. Coinbase, a cryptocurrency platform, has announced that over 40% of Coinbase’s code is written by artificial intelligence, according to CEO Brian Armstrong. However, ... [2829 chars]

title: ‘We share common concerns regarding terrorism’: Modi says in a joint press confrence with Singapore PM
description: India-Singapore relations go far beyond diplomacy, Modi said in Wong's presence. The prime minister said both sides decided that cooperation between the two countries in areas of artificial intelligence, quantum and other digital technologies will be enhanced.
content:
Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Thursday said that India and Singapore share common concerns regarding terrorism and believe that fighting it together is the duty of all nations.

title: Sam Altman Warns Of AI Bot Surge On Elon Musk's X, Revives 'Dead Internet' Fears As Feud With xAI Escalates
description: OpenAI CEO Sam Altman raised concerns about the growing presence of artificial intelligence-generated accounts on Elon Musk's X platform.
content:

title: A new generative AI approach to predicting chemical reactions improves accuracy and reliability
description: Many attempts have been made to harness the power of new artificial intelligence and large language models (LLMs) to try to predict the outcomes of new chemical reactions. These have had limited success, in part because until now they have not been grounded in an understanding of fundamental physical principles, such as the laws of conservation of mass.

description: OTTAWA — A new report argues the rise of gig work, artificial intelligence and rapid population growth are souring job prospects for Canada's youngest workers.
